Html:
Hi, most of the MP3's ive tried work under nAudio,  but for some reason one of the sample mp3's under windows 7 doesnt.


under the sample music folder, its called "Maid with the Flaxen Hair.mp3"


WMP plays it without issue.



here is the error.



System.FormatException was unhandled
  Message=Not a recognised MP3 block

       at NAudio.Wave.Mp3Frame..ctor(Stream input) in G:\projects\media center\wpf\NAudio-1-3\Source Code\NAudio\FileFormats\Mp3\Mp3Frame.cs:line 153


cheers
Anton
ug, for some reason codeplex is killing my newlines

Hi, I am aware of this issue. We could fix it by simply going byte by byte through the file to find the first valid MP3 frame, but I need to implement some kind of pushback input stream first so that it doesn't break streaming MP3s over the network

Mark
